description: This app will send an HTML formatted SMTP email to the specified values

inputs.description: This should be the email sender. Depending on the SMTP server you may need 'Send As' access from this email address.
inputs.name: sender

inputs.description: This should be a single or multiple email addresses you want to send the HTML formatted email too.
inputs.name: receiver

inputs.description: This should be the password to the account that is "sending" this HTML formatted email.
inputs.name: password

inputs.description: This should be the IP address or DNS name of the SMTP server. i.e. smtp.yahoo.com
inputs.name: smtp_server

inputs.description: This will be a HTML formatted string to use as the body of the email.
inputs.name: html_body

inputs.description: This will be the subject of the email being sent.
inputs.name: subject

inputs.description: This should be the port used to connect to the SMTP server. i.e. 25 or 465
inputs.name: port
